message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you! Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,500. Please let me know if this is within your range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking for a bit more. How about we settle on $9,000? That's still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let's close this deal!

Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I would like to stick to my original offer of $8,500. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product to me. I hope we can come to an agreement.
